column5: need a diy for rod cork handle. thanks
DIY what? Clean it ? Make one? shorten one? lenghten one?
If you're talking cleaning, lightly sand with a fine-grit sandpaper, then wipe down with a wet cloth. Will look like it just came off the tackle store shelf!  Good Fishing, Justin

Make a red cedar one if you have the tools you won't regret it, I'm in love with wood handles since 2 years ago when i tried my first one, it's like the difference between no stretch line and regular line for sensitivity added and just as light surprisingly.
yes i need info how to make one: cut pieces, glue them and put on the rod, what glue to use and so on. any info would be nice thanks guys.
Spiel is your answer.  Send him a pm and he will see you get looked after properly.
You might also want to rinse you eyes with THIS site. Nice stuff in there for sure. Let us know how you make out.
I've seen that site before Roy, very nice work, I'm always tempted to get one.

wow Roy, that site is good, and the work is amazing, but its too much of a mission for me. i found a fast way here http://www.flyanglersonline.com/begin/graphite/part5.html if anyone else interested thanks for all help.
